alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:56PM EDT until July 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND EAST CENTRAL ONONDAGA COUNTIES... At 156 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Manlius, or 8 miles east of Syracuse, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Witt, Sullivan, Chittenango, Canastota, Manlius, Fayetteville, Minoa, East Syracuse, Lyndon and Kirkville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
